queries.query:
from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline" or r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Line")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "MakeupArea")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Product")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "CurrentShift")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "OEE_Hannover")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ActualRuntime")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Availability")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "DownTime")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ActualQuantity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "CompletedBatteries" or r["_field"] == "ScheduledBatteries")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

colors.name: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

queries.query:
from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Waste")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "WasteReason")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "RejectedQuantity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
